'''Everlight Cells''' are an exploration mechanic in [[Great Red Sand]], [[Sumeru]] found in the Ruins of King Deshret.

They are used to fire [[Primal Beam]]s to link with [[Neverlight Cell]]s when the [[Scarlet Sand Slate]] has sufficient clearance.

Some Everlight Cells can be moved or rotated into certain fixed positions and orientations.
